product_a_details.how_to_use: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

comparisons.ingredients: Common ingredients: Vitamin C. Unique to GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum: Hyaluronic Acid. Unique to RadiantSkin Vitamin C Serum: Aloe Vera.
comparisons.prices: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is priced at ₹699, while RadiantSkin Vitamin C Serum is priced at ₹799.
comparisons.concentrations: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum has 10% Vitamin C, while RadiantSkin Vitamin C Serum has 15% Vitamin C.
